title: Avan Ivan Lyrics Inga Enna Solludhu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Avan Ivan
Singer(s): NSK Ramya
Lyricist: VTV Ganesh
Movie: Inga Enna Solludhu
Music: Dharan Kumar

Lets go party, go party, go party, go party
Lets go party, go party, go party, go party
dance in mad way..

Thottu po, thodaamal po,
pattu po, padaamal po po
Thottu po, thodaamal po,
kettu po, kedaamal po po (2)

Avan ivan evano paththil
dhinam dhinam thirunaal unaku (2)
Aatam paatum sarakum paththil
dhinam dhinam thirunaal unaku (2)

Vittu po, odi po
dhustan nee, thoora po po.
Vittu po, tholangi po
hepatitis B illa sethu po popo.

Avan ivan evano paththil
dhinam dhinam thirunaal unaku (2)
Aatam paatum sarakum paththil
dhinam dhinam thirunaal unaku (2)

Avan ivan evano paththil
dhinam dhinam thirunaal unaku (2)

seo.title: Avan Ivan Lyrics Inga Enna Solludhu Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Avan Ivan Lyrics Inga Enna Solludhu Song Lyrics from Inga Enna Solludhu. Read the lyrics penned by VTV Ganesh and composed by Dharan Kumar and sung by Ramya NSK. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: VTV Ganesh, Inga Enna Solludhu, Dharan Kumar, Ramya NSK, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
